title: The Horrors
description: Uncontrollable shaking, cold sweats, and a constant sense of dread.
effect: WP test when confronting source of fear or become Stunned for 1 round.

title: Phobia
description: An irrational fear of a specific thing (GM chooses trigger).
effect: Fear (2) test when exposed to phobia trigger.

title: Obsessive-Compulsive
description: The character must perform specific rituals or behaviors.
effect: WP test or must perform ritual (wastes half action each round).

title: Paranoia
description: Absolute conviction that others plot against the character.
effect: -20 to Fellowship tests with allies. Cannot willingly turn back to allies.

title: Delusions
description: The character believes something patently false.
effect: GM may impose inappropriate actions based on delusion.

title: Kleptomania
description: Compulsive stealing of small objects.
effect: WP test or must attempt to steal a small item when opportunity arises.

title: Narcissism
description: Overwhelming self-importance and need for admiration.
effect: -10 to Command and Fellowship when not center of attention.

title: Fugue State
description: Periodic loss of awareness, wandering or acting automatically.
effect: GM may trigger fugues during stress â€” character acts on autopilot for 1d10 rounds.

title: Hemophobia
description: Extreme fear of blood.
effect: WP test when seeing significant blood or become Stunned for 1 round.

title: Pyromania
description: Compulsive need to start fires.
effect: WP test when near flammable materials or must attempt to ignite them.

title: Reclusion
description: Overwhelming desire to isolate from others.
effect: -20 to Fellowship. Must pass WP test to voluntarily enter crowds.

title: Traumatic Flashbacks
description: Vivid reliving of past traumatic events.
effect: WP test when triggered or Stunned for 1d5 rounds.
triggers: Sensory triggers related to original trauma

title: Chronic Insomnia
description: Inability to sleep properly.
effect: Gain Fatigue after each rest period. -10 to Perception.

title: Disassociation
description: A sense of detachment from reality and one's own body.
effect: -10 to Agility and Perception. +10 to resist Fear.

title: Pathological Liar
description: Compulsive lying even when the truth would serve better.
effect: Must pass WP test to tell the truth. -20 to Deceive (lies are too outrageous).

title: Self-harm
description: The character injures themselves as a coping mechanism.
effect: After failing a Fear or WP test, takes 1d5 wounds (ignoring AP/TB).

title: Catatonia
description: Periodic episodes of complete unresponsiveness.
effect: When triggered, character is helpless for 1d10 rounds.

title: Hallucinations
description: Seeing and hearing things that aren't there.
effect: -20 to Perception. GM may introduce false sensory information.

title: Megalomania
description: Grandiose delusions of power and destiny.
effect: Must pass WP test to retreat from combat or accept orders.

title: Psychotic Break
description: Complete break from reality. Violence, incoherence, and terror.
effect: Character is uncontrollable for 1d10 rounds. Attacks nearest creature.
triggers: Major trauma or accumulation of stress
